blog.quote: He got into one of the boats belonging to Simon Luke 5:3 NIV
blog.title: When Jesus Comes on Board
blog.btext:
One day Jesus saw

Some bold paragraph text.

‘...you will be able to discern what is best…’ Philippians 1:10 NIV test is bold test I left at the waters edge two boats, left there by the fishermen, who were washing their nets. He got into one of the boats like Peter Because You say so
